subject: We are grateful, long one,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:

--part1_28426.5ffa5632.3c13cbed_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Here's a long one, it goes, "we're not grateful"  then a lady says, "you'll 
be grateful, you'll get in"  then a young voice says, "we are  grateful" 
then "do we got a  choice?" then a man says, "don't go  in" then they say, "we 
are  grateful"  so, I guess they decide it would be best to go  in.  I 
slowed it down a bit, hoping you can hear it.   sf
--part1_28426.5ffa5632.3c13cbed_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
